title: A union drive at Amazon fails
description:
Workers at an Amazon warehouse in Bessemer, Alabama, voted overwhelmingly not to form a union. But as Recode's Jason Del Rey (@DelRey) explains, union organizers believe their fight isn't over. 

References: 
Read Jason’s story here

itunes:subtitle: Amazon warehouse workers voted against forming a union by about a 2-1 margin
